parameter.name: title
parameter.label: Widget Title
parameter.description: This tile will be showed as header of widget block. Empty to disable

parameter.name: addition_cls
parameter.label: Addition Class
parameter.description: This class is used to make owner style for the widget.

parameter.name: color_button
parameter.label: Button Type
parameter.description: Select types suitable for your button.

parameter.name: icon
parameter.label: Button Icon
parameter.description:
Button icon. You can input Font Awesome Icon at here. For example: fa fa-home
More information font awesome icon at here: https://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icons/

parameter.name: size
parameter.label: Button Size
parameter.description: Select size suitable for your button.

parameter.name: el_class
parameter.label: Extra class name
parameter.description: If you wish to style particular content element differently, then use this field to add a class name and then refer to it in your css file.

parameter.name: html
parameter.label: Custom button attributes
parameter.description:
Input custom html attribute of the button. You can input event click for button.
For example: onclick="callTheFunction();"
